name: Demo plugin - allow plugin to dismiss post

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Demo plugin - allow plugin to dismiss post
————————————————————————————
Server min-version: 5.14
Demo plugin version: ➜ v0.1.0
  1. With demo-plugin enabled, at-mention the demo plugin user by typing "@demo_plugin hello"
inline.expectedResult: • Observe that the original post is deleted and an ephemeral post is posted, like "Shh! You must not talk about the demo plugin user."

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) Allow plugins to dismiss posts through the MessageWillBePosted hook — MM-15694
